objects.text:
BUY ONE, GET ONE FREE
Your Garden Deserves This!

• Pure white, bell-shaped blooms for
   stunning garden displays
• Hardy perennials that naturalize
   and multiply year after year
• Perfect for woodland gardens,
   borders and shaded areas

product_details.name: Elegant White Spanish Bluebells | Spring-Flowering Woodland Bulbs
product_details.description:
• ✨ Pure white, bell-shaped blooms create a stunning garden display
• 🌱 Hardy perennial bulbs that naturalize and multiply year after year
• 🦋 Perfect for woodland gardens, borders, and shade-tolerant landscaping
• 📏 Grows to 12-15 inches tall with multiple flowers per stem
• 🌺 Long-lasting spring blooms from April to May
• 🪴 Easy to grow and low maintenance
• 🌿 Excellent for cutting gardens and fresh flower arrangements
• 💧 Drought-tolerant once established
• 🏡 Ideal for creating natural-looking drifts under trees and shrubs
• 🐝 Attracts pollinators to your garden

banner_details:
This botanical-themed promotional banner is split into two soft green backgrounds with a curved-line pattern and circular dotted elements that suggest organic flow. The left segment holds several text elements, structured hierarchically: a bold headline ("heading") in dark green conveying excitement, followed by a promotional subheader ("subheading") highlighted in a lighter green. Beneath that is a product description ("description") in smaller font, offering key selling points in a list format. Below, a product title ("product_title") and an urgency-driven tagline ("tagline") maintain visual focus. A green CTA button ("cta_button") with white inner text ("cta") prompts user interaction. The right half spotlights delicate, elegant white flowers ("product_image"), visually balancing the textual elements with organic imagery.

**Color Palette:**
- Soft Mint (#F5F9F0)
- Pale Green (#E8F4E5)
- Leaf Green (#346B11)
- Lime Green (#5A9C2B)
- Spring Green (#A7D489)
- Moss Green (#86B049)
- Charcoal Brown (#3C4A34)
- White (#FFFFFF)
product_color: The product image showcases delicate white flowers with green stems set against a minimal white background. The predominant color palette includes soft white (#F9F9F9), muted green (#5A7D3F), light moss green (#AFC8A0), and a hint of pale cream (#F1EEDF). The white petals with gentle shadows and highlights blend seamlessly with the green stems, creating an elegant and refreshing natural contrast. The background's clean white enhances the flowers' brightness, emphasizing purity and serenity. For an advertisement banner, this subtle palette can be used to evoke calm, freshness, and sophistication, ideal for nature-related or eco-friendly branding.
